active.label: Active
active.title: Active Skill: Moonlight Shackles
active.description:
Selene will stun the enemy in a target arena and bind them in place for several seconds.
• Stun duration: 9 seconds
• Range: 5

passive.label: Passive
passive.title: Passive Skill: Moonlight Projection
passive.description:
• For a period of time after the start of the battle, Selene will give allied units partial damage immunity and increase attack power.
Damage immunity applies to all forms of damages, including reflection and curse.
• Duration: 3 / 3 / 3 / 4 / 4 / 4 / 5 / 5 / 5 / 6 / 6 / 6 / 7 / 7 / 7 (7.07/7.13/7.2) / 7.33 (7.4/7.47/7.53) / 7.67 seconds

legendary.label: Legendary
legendary.title: Legendary Skill: Moonlight Dance
legendary.description:
• After several basic attacks, awakened Selene will release the <Moonlight Dance> skill to damage enemy units in front of her and reduce their attack.
• Trigger Number: 5/4/3/3/3
• Range: 4×8
